InstalledItem.Name: Charger
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Military

The Aegis Charger has powered military fighters for generations. Tried and tested in the most demanding of situations, the Charger can handle sudden or sustained power draws with ease.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: SecureHyde
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Military

Get extra protection with the SecureHyde shield generator. This military-grade component provides superior durability over every other shield generator in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: Voir
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Military

The Voir is not just for the military anymore. Now you too can attach this small radar to your ship to stay safe.

InstalledItem.Name: Expedition
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Tarsus 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Cruise through space confident that your perfectly balanced Expedition quantum drive from Tarsus will get you exactly where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1
